content.raw: Keeping it a local instance will allow us to initialize systems in parallel, and the registrar doesn’t need to last the lifetime of the server. Constructing this multiple times is fine since it’s a lightweight object and Init occurs only once at startup. The registrar class allows us to extend the functionality of registration without changing the signature of the System::Init.
